pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, November 15, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, November 15, 2017:

All times local.

Vancouver, British Columbia

8:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Opening Plenary of the UN Peacekeeping Defence Ministerial Conference and will deliver remarks.  

Ballroom C, Level 1
Vancouver Convention Centre

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media.
  • Media who have not yet registered through the Registration and Accreditation portal must do so by 8 a.m. PST on November 15. Media can also register by providing their full name and media outlet to Catherine.gagnaire@canada.ca and will be required to present a valid piece of government photo ID upon arrival.

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Main Press Theatre, Ballroom A
Vancouver Convention Centre

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media.
  • Media who have not yet registered through the Registration and Accreditation portal must do so by 8 a.m. PST on November 15. Media can also register by providing their full name and media outlet to Catherine.gagnaire@canada.ca and will be required to present a valid piece of government photo ID upon arrival.
